## Scenario.addPlayersWithApps() method

Create and add multiple players to the scenario, with an app installed for each player.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addPlayersWithApps(playersApps: Array<{
        appBundleSource: AppBundleSource;
        options?: AppOptions;
    }>): Promise<Player[]>;
```
